effect.diamond_pearl: Inflicts regular damage. Has a 30% chance to paralyze the target. During rain dance, this move has 100% accuracy. It also has a (100 - accuracy)% chance to break through the protection of protect and detect. During sunny day, this move has 50% accuracy.
effect.platinum: Inflicts regular damage. Has a 30% chance to paralyze the target. During rain dance, this move has 100% accuracy. It also has a (100 - accuracy)% chance to break through the protection of protect and detect. During sunny day, this move has 50% accuracy.
effect.heartgold_soulsilver: Inflicts regular damage. Has a 30% chance to paralyze the target. During rain dance, this move has 100% accuracy. It also has a (100 - accuracy)% chance to break through the protection of protect and detect. During sunny day, this move has 50% accuracy.

flavor_text.diamond_pearl: A wicked thunderbolt is dropped on the foe to inflict damage. It may also leave the target paralyzed.
